#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int power(long long int a,long long int x)
{long long int result=1;

while(x!=0)
{if(x%2==1)
result=result*a;
a=a*a;
x=x/2;
}
return result;
}
int main() {ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    long long int t,l,k,r,i;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{k=0;
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    l=s.length();
    if(l==1)
    cout<<"2"<<"\n";
    else
{if(s[0]!=s[1])
k++;
if(s[l-1]!=s[l-2])
k++;
for(i=1;i<l-1;i++)
{if(s[i]!=s[i-1]&&s[i]!=s[i+1])
    k++;
}
//cout<<k<<"\n";
r=power(2,k);
cout<<r<<"\n";


    
}
}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
